## Making a function that adds numbers

```{r}
#' Add two numbers together
#'
#' @param num1 A number
#' @param num2 A number
#'
#' @returns Returns the dum of the numbers
#'
add_numbers <- function(num1, num2) {
  added <- num1 + num2
  return(added)
}

add_numbers(1, 2)
```
